name: House of Adobe - Galactible #03
description: Congratulations! You've discovered Galactible #03, the House of Adobe! Real estate is going quick in the Galactiverse, so you better snatch this one up quick! Raise your Mana by +1,000,000 bits! Galactibles are one-of-a-kind and minted as 1-of-1. Only 99 will be made! New Galactibles drop every week (sorta) on twitter, so give us a follow @Galactibles! Certified authentic original animations made by Pyramid Guy, aka Kris Kanaly. Music by Sawsquarenoise! GalactiblesÂ© 2021 | galactibles.x
